newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: Yields fall on 91-day Lithuanian T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Yields fall on 91-day Lithuanian T-bills.

text.p: Yields fell on 91-day Lithuanian Treasury bills at Monday's auction and all of the 45 million litas issue was sold as it was oversubscribed, the country's central bank said.
The average yield was 9.18 percent, down from the 10.40 percent offered at the last auction for 91-day paper on April 21.
The settlement date for the auction is May 8 and the bills mature on August 7.
All figures in millions of litas unless otherwise indicated.
